scripts.release: pnpm release:check && pnpm release:version && pnpm release:publish
scripts.release:check: pnpm test && pnpm run build && pnpm run docs
scripts.release:version: bumpp package.json base/package.json react/package.json typescript/package.json --execute="pnpm release:changelog && git add changelog.md" --commit "build: publish v%s" --tag --all
scripts.test: pnpm run build && pnpm run lint && pnpm run test:types
